name: Beidou
title: Uncrowned Lord of Ocean
description: Beidou is the leader of the Crux — an armed fleet based in Liyue Harbor. An armed fleet means exactly what it sounds like a fleet of ships armed to the teeth.

normalattack.name: Oceanborne
normalattack.description: Perform up to five consecutive strikes. When charged, performs continuous slashes before unleashing one big strike.

elementalskill.name: Tidecaller
elementalskill.description: Swings blade and deals Electro DMG. When held down, she uses her weapon as a shield. This increases her resistance to interruption and has 250% Electro DMG Absorption Efficiency.

elementalburst.name: Stormbreaker
elementalburst.description: increases interruption resistance and decreases DMG taken.

passivetalent1.name: Conqueror of Tides
passivetalent1.description: The party's swimming stamina consumption decreases by 20%.

passivetalent2.name: Retribution
passivetalent2.description: Counterattacking with Tidecaller at the right moment grants the maximum DMG Bonus.

passivetalent3.name: Lightning Storm
passivetalent3.description: After using Tidecaller, both SPD and DMG of Normal and Charged Attacks increases by 15% for 10s.

constellations.d1:
When Stormbreaker is used: 
 Creates a shield that absorbs up to 16% of Beidou's Max HP for 15s. 
 This shield absorbs Electro DMG 250% more effectively.
constellations.c2: Upon the Turbulent Sea, the Thunder Arises
constellations.d2: Stormbreaker's arc lightning can jump 2 additional targets.
constellations.d3:
Increases the Level of Tidecaller by 3.
 Maximum upgrade level is 15.
constellations.d4: Within 10s of taking DMG, Beidou's Normal Attacks gain 20% additional Electro DMG.
constellations.d5:
Increase the Level of Stormbreaker by 3.
 Maximum upgrade level is 15.
constellations.d6: During the duration of Stormbreaker, the Electro RES of surrounding enemies is decreased by 15%.

profile.description:
Captain of the Crux, with quite the reputation in Liyue. There are those who say she can split mountains and part the sea. Others say she draws lightning through her sword. Some say that even the mightiest of sea beasts are no match for her. For those not from Liyue, it may sound like a hearty joke, but those that have sailed with her will say- "No matter what sea beasts there may be, Beidou will be sure to split them all in two."
Beidou is the leader of the Crux—an armed fleet based in Liyue Harbor. An armed fleet means exactly what it sounds like: a fleet of ships armed to the teeth. Without getting into too many details, everything the Crux does is approved by the Qixing... more or less. 
Beidou is a trusted leader; so much so that her crew believes her capable of taming the storms and billows on the sea. "It's Beidou! Even the mightiest of storms must bow its head to her might!"

zhdescription: 北斗是「南十字」的首领。所谓「武装船队」，只是字面上的意思；一只装备了可靠火力的船队。不必多想，「南十字」的一切作为均已得到七星的许可……大致如此。北斗是一位能让全船队水手心服口服的首领。他们甚至愿意相信，北斗能够压制海上的巨浪与风暴。
zhtitle: 无冕的龙王、南十字之主

zhnormalattack.name: 征涛
zhnormalattack.description:
普通攻击
进行至多五段的连续挥砍。

重击
持续消耗体力，快速进行连续的斩击。重击结束时，会进行一次格外有力的挥砍。

zhelementalskill.name: 捉浪
zhelementalskill.description:
点按
积聚雷之力，猛烈向前挥舞大剑，造成雷元素伤害。

长按
举起武器形成护盾，伤害吸收量受益于北斗的生命值上限。松开技能或持续时间结束时，会挥舞大剑释放积攒的力量进行攻击，造成雷元素伤害。依据技能期间受到攻击的次数，提高释放时造成的伤害。触发2次达到最高伤害加成。

护盾具有如下效果：
·对雷元素伤害有250％的吸收效果；
·施放的瞬间，为北斗施加雷元素附着。

zhelementalburst.name: 斫雷
zhelementalburst.description:
重忆斩灭海山巨兽之战，唤起巨兽与雷电的力量，为创造环绕自身的雷兽之盾雷兽之盾，并对周围的敌人造成雷元素伤害。

雷兽之盾
·普通攻击与重击命中时，释放雷电之力，引来1道能在敌人之间跃动的闪雷，造成雷元素伤害；
·提高角色的抗打断能力，并降低受到的伤害。
每秒至多触发1道闪雷。

zhpassivetalent1.name: 遍宇灵光
zhpassivetalent1.description: 在被攻击瞬间释放捉浪反击，拥有最高伤害加成。

zhpassivetalent2.name: 霹雳连霄
zhpassivetalent2.description:
释放拥有最高伤害加成的捉浪后的10秒内获得如下效果：
·普通攻击与重击造成的伤害提高15%，攻击速度提高15%；
·大幅减少重击需要的准备时间。

zhpassivetalent3.name: 拥涛踏浪
zhpassivetalent3.description: 队伍中所有角色游泳消耗的体力降低20%。

zhconstellations.d1:
施放斫雷时：
生成一个伤害吸收量等于生命值上限16%的护盾，持续15秒。
该护盾对雷元素伤害有250%的吸收效果。
zhconstellations.d2: 斫雷的闪电能额外攻击2个敌人。
zhconstellations.d3: 捉浪的技能等级提高3级。至多提升至15级。
zhconstellations.d4: 受到攻击后的10秒内，北斗的普通攻击附带20%额外雷元素伤害。
zhconstellations.d5: 斫雷的技能等级提高3级。至多提升至15级。
zhconstellations.d6: 斫雷持续期间，周围敌人的雷元素抗性降低15%。
